docs.snippet: They form a nutritious foundation for flavorful fillings and can give new life to leftovers. If you need a quick, utterly satisfying meal, make an omelet....

docs.abstract: It will end its run on Jan. 28.

docs.snippet: It will end its run on Jan. 28....
docs.abstract: It will end its run on Jan. 28.
docs.lead_paragraph: David Henry Hwang's Broadway comedy "Chinglish," about the misadventures and cultural misunderstanding of an American businessman as he is trying to close a deal in China, will end its run on Jan. 29, after 128 performances. The bilingual play, which features Gary Wilmes as the businessman and Jennifer Lim as a Chinese official who becomes his unlikely ally and lover, opened at the Longacre Theater in October to generally favorable reviews, and was named by Time magazine as the No. 1 new American play of 2011. Despite those accolades, and the strong reputation of Mr. Hwang, a Tony Award winner whose previous work includes "M. Butterfly," box office sales remained modest.

headline.main: Huntsman Leaves Race With Plea for Party Unity

docs.snippet: Aides to Jon M. Huntsman Jr.said he believed it would be better for the party if he pulled out now....
docs.abstract: Aides to Jon M. Huntsman Jr.said he believed it would be better for the party if he pulled out now.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and JEFF ZELENY

docs.lead_paragraph: 11:36 a.m. | Updated MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. - Former Gov. Jon M. Huntsman Jr. of Utah formally ended his once-promising Republican presidential run with a call for party unity, asking the five candidates he leaves on the field to end their negative ads and chastising President Obama for engaging in "class warfare."

docs.snippet: It was a strong collection, notable for varied proportions - dropped-crotch trousers tight at the calf, upholstery-scale overcoats, snug jackets with bum-cooler skirting, modified equestrian field boots - and masterfully combined textures....
docs.abstract: It was a strong collection, notable for varied proportions - dropped-crotch trousers tight at the calf, upholstery-scale overcoats, snug jackets with bum-cooler skirting, modified equestrian field boots - and masterfully combined textures.
docs.lead_paragraph: The reference machine is always working overtime in Milan. Leonardo DiCaprio as Arthur Rimbaud in love/hate with Paul Verlaine as interpreted by Leonardo DiCaprio in Agnieszka Holland's 1995 film "Total Eclipse." That's what the designer Frida Giannini was thinking about when she began putting together her latest collection, she said backstage at Gucci on Monday.

docs.snippet: This is a house built on a coat - the trench - and Christopher Bailey always sticks smartly to the program....
docs.abstract: This is a house built on a coat - the trench - and Christopher Bailey always sticks smartly to the program.
docs.lead_paragraph: The obsessively descriptive list of coat styles in the notes for Christopher Bailey's fantastic Burberry Prorsum show read like a comprehensive history of English outerwear: "heritage trench coats, luggage lock duffle coats, sartorial tailored Chesterfields, college stripe down-filled car coats, cropped bomber jackets" and on and on and on. This is a house built on a coat - the trench - and Bailey always sticks smartly to the program. The torso-hugging, slim-legged suits at the show's opening were my favorites, with models in tweed flat caps toting umbrellas with carved animal head handles, their coats over their shoulders or buttoned up tight against the cold.
